reviewText: Enlightening and enjoyable. Good overview of Indians in the modern world. A little bit short, but very much worth it,

This is the last word in Choctaw vids. I remember learning about a casino and there was dancing and music too. The Choctaw are a very complex people with a rich history and this exhaustive 12 minute vid peels away that history generation-by-generation and almost moment-by-moment, like a blooming onion from the app menu at Outback Steakhouse. I would highly recommend this vid to anyone that is interested in the Choctaw people or just great vids in general.
enjoyed what little i saw in 12 minutes; would like to have at least 15 more minutes, sorry but was disapointed,  mike jarrells
